review: I got this as a gift. It does what I mainly bought it to do, i.e. stream video from my OS X desktop to my old and not smart TV. Also allows me to stream netflix and a variety of other streaming services I rarely if ever use. Somehow I feel like I would have been happier with the Amazon Fire TV Stick (did I get all the words in there?) as it seems to be nominally more powerful and functional and only a few dollars more. But I can't look a gift horse in the mouth, and I honestly don't quite know what I'm missing out on.
author: Chris in DC

review: I have purchased about three of these chrome sticks, they are easy to break if you install this wrong.  It comes with an adapter for a reason,. use it.  I have gifted the product as well.  I have three TV's, but one is a smart TV, with built in casting capabilities.  But the other aren't, so this is a great option to view picture, videos, movies and share or even use your TV to cast from your computer.  I just love the options and how this device has made it so much easier to enjoy our TV equipment in the home.
